snippet: A report presented to Malawian President Joyce Banda revealed that after the death of the former president, officials held secret meetings to prevent her from assuming power.
abstract: At least 10 former senior government officials in Malawi, including cabinet ministers, are arrested and accused of plotting coup to prevent Joyce Banda from assuming power after death of president Bingu wa Mutharika in April 2012.
lead_paragraph: A report presented to Malawian President Joyce Banda revealed that after the death of the former president, officials held secret meetings to prevent her from assuming power.

headline.seo: 10 Malawian Ex-Officials Arrested Over a 2012 Coup Plot
headline.main: Malawi: 10 Ex-Officials Arrested Over a 2012 Coup Plot
headline.print_headline: Malawi: 10 Ex-Officials Arrested Over a 2012 Coup Plot

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
